original: Klette, Card Alrik Harald, civ.ilför-svarsdirektör, Kalmar, f. 5/2/99 i Vis-sefjärda, Kalmar k G. 24 m. Aina Sterner. Barn: Gunvor f. 25, Nils-Gustav 28, Ingegärd 32, Viveca 45. — Bitr. å kronolänsmans- o. landsfiskals-kont., e. samt e. o. landskanslist, förordn. å landsfiskals-, .stadsfiskails-, po-liskommiss:- o. landskansi :tjänster 16-26, landsfiskal i Södra Vi distr. 26-36, i Rockneby distr. 36-41, i Vasismo-iösa distr. 41-44, e. o. civilförsv :dir. i Kalmar län ’sed. 44. Bk a. styr :led. i skytteförb., skyttekrets o. skytteför-en. sed. 28. Hobby: ’skol’skyttet.
translated: Klette, Carl Alrik Harald, civilian defense director, Kalmar, b. 2/5/1899 in Vissefjärda, Kalmar County. Married on 24 May with Aina Sterner. Children: Gunvor b. 1925, Nils-Gustav b. 1928, Ingegärd b. 1932, Viveca b. 1945. Assistant at the County Sheriff's Office and Bailiff's Office, substitute and acting County Clerk, appointed to Bailiff's, City Bailiff's, Police Commissioner's and County Clerk's services from 1916-1926. Bailiff in the Southern Vi district from 1926-1936, in Rockneby district from 1936-1941, in Västervik district from 1941-1944, acting civilian defense director in Kalmar County since 1944. Serving as a board member of the Shooting Association, Shooting District, and Shooting Club since 1928. Hobby: school shooting.
